alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 11:50PM CDT until June 18 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Delta County in north central Texas... Lamar County in north central Texas... Northeastern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1150 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sumner, or 15 miles northwest of Paris, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Blossom, Roxton, Lake Bonham, Pat Mayse Lake, Lake Crook, Powderly, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Crockett Lake, Pattonville, Arthur City, Coffee Mill Lake, Camp Maxey, Forest Hill, Deport, Windom, Novice and Toco. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
